title: WTB Mathewson Dark Cap, WaJo Hands/Glove, Cy Young Bare Hand
author: Cozumeleno

posts.post_title: WTB Mathewson Dark Cap, WaJo Hands/Glove, Cy Young Bare Hand
posts.post_content:
Looking to buy these three T206 cards in beater or low grade condition.

Walter Johnson and Cy Young need to be PSA or SGC graded (Auth or 1 is perfect). Prefer a Matty raw but will consider PSA/SCG Auth or 1.
I have a beater Mathewson in my trade thread.
